comments.message: My second time trying the chendol mcflurry, and it wasn't 'familiar' at all. I think you got the proportion all mixed up. There seem to be 80% ice cream, 15% syrup, 4% coconut flakes and 1% jelly. Using 'sweet' to describe the mcflurry would be an understatement. And thank you for making the jelly a scarce commodity. I counted 5.5 jelly during my treasure hunt. 😡
Bring over the super delicious and succulent Pork Burger you have in Japan and Thailand. And draft beer from Korea! Just set up one non-halal McD outlet in Singapore for a start - untapped market!
Been seeing lots of ads about your mcmuffins on YouTube. Can y'all bring the bagels they have in HK McD over here? So good.

Macdonald at Chinatown - the manager is quite rude - her name is Shufen. I asked about the wedges with the customer service auntie and she say it's not selling and had no idea why they put it on the board. I joked with her too becos it was advertised. Obviously both of us missed the date as it starts selling from 7-sep. Shufen, with an angry face, heard our conversation and she said to the auntie " can't you see, it is stated on the board !" - I was still ordering other stuff so obviously she was telling me ! I think that was very rude.

ordered the nasi lemak burger for dinner Tues 5 September ard 6PM, Block 451 Clementi McDonald's branch. had a shock when the burger came... less than 1 teaspoon of sauce estimated? SUPER DRY. Had to gulp down the burger with my coke (from the set meal), else choke la. Funny thing I ordered this before from Metropolis branch (Buona Vista) and they gave lots of sauce. Why is there such a HUGE difference in standard?

Was in a rush else would have demanded refund or something. Spoke to a Ms Janet Yeo towards end of the meal (she saw how I was struggling to finish the dry burger), and she told me to feedback to you guys.

ps: whoever ordering the nasi lemak burger please CHECK your sauce so you dont end up like me. thanks

Guys, just a heads up while ordering your McDonald delivery. pls ensure that you have check your items before receiving them and record down with proper evidence in photo or video with the deliveryman in it if ure missing any of your orders. 

Today their shift manager from Queensway branch accused me of receiving the missing items but still calling in in hope to receive free burgers. As mentioned by their caller on the phone, "if you want free items, I'll give you it to you free" instead of apologising for missing part of my orders and sending it down immediately, this is what I get. being accused of stealing nasi lemak burgers. seriously wtf.

McDonald's is no longer the same anymore. coz ppl like us are not able to afford their nasi lemak burger.
I guess Mcd now has a lot more understanding in the meaning of the "closer-to-home" feel yah, cheers to that! Hopefully to see and feel more "closer-to-home" with Mcd in the near future! 😊
Should bring back Chicken McCrispy...
I love it it's freaking good please let this burger be mainstay!!!!!

Nasi lemak with NASI please! It was a nostalgic item from 2002! Really miss it!
Just finished enjoying the nasi lemak burger..really delicious! 👍
OMG!!! Wedges are back!!! Oh and I guess some random burger? Idk they have 1 like every month.

7.post_text:
1-for-1 Frappé from McCafé!
1 for you and 1 for your BFF. Or indulge in both.

Terms & Conditions: 
• Available only in Singapore McCafe® from 21 – 27 August 2017, while stocks last. • Promotion not valid in conjunction with any other on-going promotions, discounts, offers or privileges. • Complimentary Frappé has to be same or lower priced to the purchased Frappé. • Limited to 2 redemptions per transaction. • Promotion not valid via McDonald’s self-ordering kiosk, Drive Thrus and McDelivery® nor at Gardens by the Bay, LIDO, iFly, Resorts World Sentosa, NTU, NUS, Singapore Poly and Temasek Poly.

#McCafesg #1for1Frappe #AnHonestCupOfCoffee #McCafeDevoteeApp

comments.message: I bought these 9 pc chicken nuggets from Mcdonalds (Springleaf Tower) through the drive thru on wednesday night. I went home and ate abt 5 delicious nuggets. Then the 6th & 7th nuggets were stuck to each other. I peeled them apart and saw this soggy cold spot on each nugget. I dont think the surface on those spots were cooked. I think there ought to be better quality checks in place. Food poisoning could well occur. I ate around the spot but got uneasy and didnt eat the other piece.

Re Serene Centre branch, your service is so slow because of takeouts. Queue for collecting is so slow while I see your staff busy preparing take always. Give priority to those customers who come in !!!

plse stick to the original chicken nuggets.. i prefer just nuggets.. why came up with this idea when the problem is the sauce.. it's the sauce.. IT'S THE SAUCE!!! mcdonald's szechuan sauce.. curry sauce.. bbq sauce.. IT'S THE SAUCE that make chicken nuggets even more sooooOOOOO TASTY!!! COME ON!!

Today 18-9-2017 Monday at ang mo kio park macdonalds 12pm

counter staff name susan was very rude and unfriendly as this is not the first time I order from her, as this time I can't take it anymore and ask her why like this and when she going to collect the small fries at the fries area and she take the the small fries and pour almost half the pack of fries into the fries area when I saw it, and I ask her why must do that and she said is too much and I ask her to take up and show me this is under pack. she reply rudely and in an unfriendly way to a customer that I alway visit macdonalds. so I was very angry to the way she like this, so i tell her I need to see the manager and she waited for a min and she ask a 2nd manage name Tan Yi Shan. she is so friendly and nice that listening to what I told her and I also told her to bring it to the highest management as I don't want her to cover the staff susan. as I'll also send out to other macdonalds website and wait for the reply. I hope you'll investigate it and get back to me asap. thanks alot as I don't want other customers have the same problem with me and have bad reputation on macdonalds. please get back to me asap thanks.

I'm so sorry. Keep reading on, or die tonight a exactly
12:42. This
is based on a TRUE STORY! Once there
was
a baby
girl named Marry. Her mother couldn't
take
all the
crying, so she decided it was time for her
to
go. She
buried her baby alive in her back yard.
After she
buried her she could still hear Marry
crying.
So she dug her back up and stabbed her
one
time in the arm,
and buried her again. Marry cried harder,
but a few
hours later it stopped. At exactly 12:42,
Marry died.
She bleed to death. Now her sprite
haunts
the
world. When your sleeping, she stabs
you in
the
arm and watches you bleed to death.
And
that's how she got the name "Bloody
Marry" this is the true story
of her. She wants everyone to feel her
pain
that she
felt. Apparently, if you re-post This isn't
fake.
Apparently, if you copy and paste this to
ten
comments in the next ten minuets you
will
have the
best day of your life tomorrow. You will
either get kissed or asked out, if you
brake
this chain you will
see a little dead girl in your room tonight.
In the next
53 minuets someone will say I love you
or
I'm sorry
to 12 other comments you will have the
best day of
your life tomorrow. But if you break this
chain you die
at exactly 12:42 tonight by Bloody Marry.

Dear McDonald’sToa payoh Safra. Thanks for helping a dad as well as her daughter out when we dropped our McNuggets on the floor. Without asking , Priya brought replacement nuggets for my daughter. You are awesome Priya. !!!

Dear McDonald's - ARC Shopping Mall, McDonald's,  a compliment to Ms Annie Tan who deserved a pay raise!  

- It's the 2nd time she came with a big smile offering handmade balloons for our boys when we were dining at McDonald's. Maybe, she didn't even realised it. She said its her job. But as a mum I sincerely appreciated it. 

- Always greet us with a big smile.
- Always take pride in her work.
- Always ensure the tables are clean so that the next customer could enjoy their meal in comfort.
- Always kind in accommodating the customer's request.

I appreciate it. Not sure if you do? Frankly, how many staffs like Ms Annie took pride in doing the job well nowadays? Hopefully, this compliment helps.  

WELL DONE, Ms Annie! Keep up your good work and smile always. A BIG THANK YOU from us. Sincerely from our family.
Gary Wenquan Luo
McGriddles pls.

15.post_text: We asked you to share a great memory with McDonald’s Singapore over the last 3 decades that we’ve been a part of your everyday lives, and we were overwhelmed by your heartfelt response! This is a little project to celebrate our story of togetherness. Celebrate the people who make this home. Thank you Singapore, and happy birthday!

comments.message: Penny Lay, I experienced the same thing as well on 10 Aug. After my exams, I head over to Mcdonald and ordered 2 vanilla ice cream cones. Upon payment, the aunty told me no more 50 cents promo available. I told her promo is till 10 Aug, she checked with her colleague and her colleague said the same thing, "Promo valid until National day, 9 aug". Didn't feel like arguing, so I just bought the 2 ice creams at non-promo price. Pretty disappointing when staffs can't even follow simple instructions.

Jason, I experienced the same thing as u!! MACDONALD's staff told me no fifty cents ice cream and since I already brought 5 of my nieces and nephews there I couldn't possibly disappoint them and so bought the cones at usual full price!! I was certain I wasn't wrong about the 50cents promo but they told me no such thing!!
Which kiosks can get Chendol Melaka cone?
I just bought a vanilla cone for $0.80 .. and promo said till 10th selling at $0.50 ... ice cream Aunty told me no more promo ????

We would like to say a big THANK YOU to all of you! We are truly touched by the lovely photos, stories and comments that you’ve shared with us. It’s been 38 wonderful years in Singapore with you, and we look forward to creating many more special memories together! :)

I still remember the jingle "Get a free 20 piece chicken mcnugget when you buy any extra value meal". lol.

My memory of McDonald's is way back in 1979, when it first started at Liat Towers, I was in my late teens and keen to try something new, i asked my aunt to bring me there. I was curious and asked what is a burger. The crew explained it's beef in between the bun, my aunt hesitated as she doesn't take beef, good thing there's fillet o fish and I remembered having a great time enjoying it with the fries and Coke. 2 years later, I did part time at Robina House branch in my pre u days,  had fond memories of knowing people and the inside out of the operations... Till now, it's still a place I will visit regularly... Thanks for the great memories :)
My first McDonald's burger was in LAS in mid 80s during my first 28 days tour of US East and West Coast including Vancouver and Toronto. But my first burger is A&W burger during the mid 60s.

18.post_text: Dear Valued Customers, we are performing scheduled system maintenance and upgrading works on our McDelivery system from 0400 hours to 0500 hours on 7 August 2017. Therefore, we are unable to accept McDelivery orders through our website, mobile app and hotline during this period. You may wish to visit our 24 hrs restaurants during this time. Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience and bear with us in the meantime.

comments.message:
I was at Khatib Macdonalds just 30 minutes ago, me and my friends presented our Safra Cards but then we were denied of either of the free gifts and said that it's only for SAFRA MACDONALDS!

Felt like the promotion was not honoured at all. Are u able to clarify on this?
Hi I am new citizen from India. I got pink IC but I don't serve army. Can I claim the free treat?

So true lah only army personnel? Air force, navy, police, scdf all not important. So let army run the ambulance lah. And attend to fire. And solve crimes. And protect he airspace. And roam the seas. Aiyah nvm lah just a stupid sundae anyway
Why is not include Hometeam  members? We do serve NS too!!!  Wake up!!!

Hi. could you please clarify? 

https://m.facebook.com/story.php?story_fbid=1522993927747175&id=157162220997026

I ordered my meal at the outlet at AMK Branch Ave 3. 

I was denied the promo when I presented my SAFRA card. the manager said only those McDonald's outlet in SAFRA accept the presentation of the SAFRA card. 

she then insist that this promo is only for army personnel and SAFRA card doesn't determined that I was army. 

I kindly explained to her that, because I am from the army, I am able to apply for the SAFRA membership. if I was not from the army, I will be only carrying the home team ns card. 

just to add, men like us, who have gone through NS are posted to different areas within mindef. does this also mean that those who were not from the army (eg: police force etc.. as part of their national service) are denied from this promotion?

Just produce pink IC will be enough? From the comments it seemed that even those who produce SAFRA cards get rejected. Can McDonald confirm this? I dun want to look like a fool arguing with your staffs over how your promotion should be jus becoz they are not well-informed enough. Had experiences where your staffs rejected a promotion I shown her through LINE coz she thought it's supposed to be on your surprise app instead.
Apparently Home Team NSF/NSMen are not included
Saluting all NSmen, past and present? Not sincere in your promotion. Made my dad seem like a fool. 👎🏻
My dad a NSman bought 2 EVM, showed his PINK NRIC and was denied of the free gifts also. McDonald staff said is for NSF only. BOO!

If ur not fair enough pls bring down this article bullshit then adk ur army go for RTA then go ask ur army drive their ambulance then go ask army to safe fire 🔥 go ask ur army take care of the bank go ask ur army catch robbery ...

Dear McDonald's - My family and I were at the 600 Toa Payoh Lorong 4 branch today and we bought 3 EVMs. We were not told of any promotion. While we understand that we need to volunteer our ICs to claim the freebies, it is very likely that we were not told of the promotion as the service staff deemed that we are not current NS men to be entitled to the promotion.

There was no prominent display of the 'Celebrating NS50' promotion at the cashier. 

Very disappointing.

Seriously Mac .This whole fiasco has been an absolute disgrace on all levels. As though the food is actually good in the first place. Management needs to seriously reflect on themselves and prevent such a farcical situation from happening again.

19.post_text: At McDonald's, we're saluting all NS Men, past and present, for their service to the nation. From 4 – 10 August, enjoy a free Sundae or Apple Pie with any purchase of an Extra Value MealTM! Simply present your SAFRA card, 11B card, or pink IC at our counters to enjoy your sweet treat. Just for you, Singapore! #NS50

24.post_text: Made for Singapore since 1999 - the McSpicy® has since become an iconic favourite for everyone. And now, it's made even better with the added sizzle of a fresh, golden egg! Best savoured with a Dinosaur McFlurry® and Criss Cut Fries. Just for you, Singapore!
